label: Subutai(tm) Blockchain Router
Description1: 18 Watt Broadband Router (Hardwired ETHERNET and 802.11b/g/n), RAID enhanced Networks Attached Storage (NAS), IoT gateway, green cryptocurrency mining, TPM Ultra-Security
Description2: A highly efficient (18 Watt) and expandable broadband router that is also an IoT gateway, NAS server, and cryptocurrency mining system that uses an FPGA for efficient and flexible mining.  Using a TPM processor it inspects every packet passing through the system for malware using fuzzy logic.
Suggested Groups: Internet service providers, telecoms, electric utilities, social programs (providing low-cost or free Internet to people)
description:
#
## About Subutai(tm) Blockchain Router
![About Subutai(tm) Blockchain Router()]
### 18 Watt Broadband Router (Hardwired ETHERNET and 802.11b/g/n), RAID enhanced Networks Attached Storage (NAS), IoT gateway, green cryptocurrency mining, TPM Ultra-Security
A highly efficient (18 Watt) and expandable broadband router that is also an IoT gateway, NAS server, and cryptocurrency mining system that uses an FPGA for efficient and flexible mining.  Using a TPM processor it inspects every packet passing through the system for malware using fuzzy logic.
